ygData.subject: Gladiator Tournament
ygData.msgSnippet: I m thinking it would be cool if we got some kind of Gladiator tournament going on.  I ve written out a basic outline of how the rules would work on my own,
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 24
Message-ID: <17248.24.84.959279670@...>
Date: 21 Mar 1999 04:21:25 -0000
From: shayd@...
Subject: Gladiator Tournament


I'm thinking it would be cool if we got some kind
of Gladiator tournament going on.  I've written
out a basic outline of how the rules would work
on my own, and would be happy to organize it, but
I need to know if anyone would participate.

I'd also like to have assistance by people in
making the maps specifically for the tournament.
I'm thinking the first tournament set can consist
of 3-5 levels, then we can release different
mapsets, all of which will have to be started with
a brand new gladiator team.

Winning would mean you had the highest valued team
of anyone--a valuation system I still haven't
devised, but I think it would work like 100 coins
per level per warrior, 200 coins per level per
mage--and work out like that.  These coins, as
well as your bare coin value combined with the
level you're on would be used to determine your
point stand on some kind of online ladder, that
could either be posted on the main FSGames page
or on my page.  (FSGames could just link to it
then.)

Tell me what you guys think...

-Chris
